price: But they will not take heed unless Allah so wills. He is most worthy to be feared and most worthy to forgive.
arabic: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
